group_1.narration: Kyubey pretty much showed up@the second I called for him.
I learned a whole lot from him this time.@About Magical Girls, and Witches.
Seika had been fightin' for a long time.@But me and Leila had no clue.
And now Leila decided to fight@as a Magical Girl, too.

group_1.textLeft: I...I want things to go back to how they@were between Leila and Seika!
I don't want it to go back to how it was.@It's more like...what is it...?
I want to make it so they aren't fighting @anymore!

group_1.narration: When I asked that, Kyubey said I could@think about becoming a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: I can get any wish I want granted.

group_1.narration: Look at what happened with Leila.@She made a contract, but that just made@things worse between her and Seika.
Somethin' about this contract thing...@It feels kinda scary. Like, I'm pretty@freaked out. I can't just rush into this.
But it's clear I definitely can't do@anything about this on my own.

group_1.textLeft: (If I made a contract too, then Seika would@be extra furious.)
(But I can't just keep goin' like I have.)
(At any rate, I need to think about Leila@and Seika.)

group_1.narration: Right then, it hit me like a truck!
I want to do something to help Seika and @Leila get along.
Besides, from what Kyubey said,@it's really tough fighting as a Magical Girl.@I can't force them to do that on their own!
So I really oughta become one too.@Even if they get mad at me.@Yeah, I've made up my mind.
But if I make the wrong wish I might@mess things up even more.
I have a feelin' it's not Witches that@caused all these problems between us.
So I thought as hard as I could about it.@And then I found the answer!

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey... I wanna sign up to be a Magical@Girl!
